local_intent: Verify cloth visibility, approach above the edge, lower slowly until contact, and confirm contact.
assumptions: Cloth edge is visible and reachable
Workspace above the edge is clear
Force threshold 5.0 is safe for fabric contact
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach-contact phase using IsObjectVisible -> MoveAbove -> LowerUntilContact -> ContactDetected with parameters aligned to the global tree.
